mapper.select: SELECT sa.id, sa.spu_id, sa.sale_attr_id , sale_attr_name, sv.id value_id, sv.spu_id value_spu_id, sv.sale_attr_id value_sale_attr_id, sale_attr_value_name FROM spu_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value sv ON sa.sale_attr_id=sv.sale_attr_id WHERE sv.spu_id=#{spuId} and sa.spu_id=#{spuId}

SELECT sa.id, sa.spu_id, sa.sale_attr_id , sa. sale_attr_name, sv.id value_id, sv.spu_id value_spu_id, sv.sale_attr_id value_sale_attr_id, sv. sale_attr_value_name, IF(ssv.id IS NULL ,'0','1') is_checked FROM spu_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value sv ON sa.sale_attr_id=sv.sale_attr_id AND sa.spu_id=sv.spu_id LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value ssv ON ssv.sale_attr_value_id=sv.id AND sku_id=#{skuId} WHERE sv.spu_id=#{spuId}
